name: hun
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short form of honey: a way of speaking to someone you like or love, or someone who you want to be friendly to: You OK, hun? Good luck, hun, and have a good day!
More examplesFewer examplesWe could have a party for them, couldn't we, hun?Do you have a job, hun, or are your hands full with the babes?Better luck next time, hun!Please tell me what you think. Thank you hun!The waitress called me "hun" each time she came to my table and the service was quick.
